summary: i18n migration testing for Reservations and Directory modules completed successfully. Both modules now support Spanish and English translations using react-i18next. Fixed a bug where role badges in Directory were not being translated - they were displaying raw database values instead of using the t() function.
critical_code_review_comments: ResidentReservations.jsx correctly implements useTranslation hook with all t() calls for: title, subtitle, tabs, area types, behavior labels, status badges, days, buttons, and dialog content
ProfileDirectory.jsx correctly implements useTranslation with translated section headers (directory.roleLabels) and now also translates role badges on cards using roles.labels.* keys

Translation keys for reservations module include: reservations.title, reservations.subtitle, reservations.areasTab, reservations.myReservationsTab, reservations.areaTypes.*, reservations.behaviorLabels.*, reservations.statusLabels.*, reservations.daysShort.*, reservations.daysFull.*
Translation keys for directory module include: directory.title, directory.searchPlaceholder, directory.roleLabels.*, roles.labels.*
updated_files: /app/frontend/src/components/ProfileDirectory.jsx - Fixed role badge translation at line 255 to use t(`roles.labels.${role}`, role) instead of raw {role}

success_rate.frontend: 100% (all i18n translations verified for both Spanish and English)

context_for_next_testing_agent: i18n migration for Reservations and Directory modules complete and verified. All components use useTranslation hook correctly. Language switching works via Profile page with LanguageSelector component (data-testid: language-btn-es, language-btn-en). Fixed ProfileDirectory.jsx line 255 to translate role badges. Expected console errors: GPS GeolocationPositionError (headless browser), 403 resource errors (condominium modules - non-blocking).

bug_fixed.description: Role badges in ProfileDirectory.jsx were showing raw Spanish role names from database instead of translated values
bug_fixed.impact: Directory now correctly shows translated role badges in both Spanish and English
